meaningMnemonic: If someone is coming toward you in a <radical>car</radical>, holding a <radical>weapon</radical> in their <radical>hand</radical>, they're going to <kanji>attack</kanji> you!
readingMnemonic: Right before the <kanji>attack</kanji> begins, you recognize the hand holding this weapon and driving this car. It's <reading>Gecki</reading> (げき), your long-lost gecko who you may or may not have let fly off into a really fierce tsunami. Oops. I think he may be here attacking you out of revenge.
